citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 AM to 12:00
PM on 03AUG2022.
The inspectors knocked on the front door, called both cell phones, yelled hello out back towards the facility, and waited 30
minutes for a response, or return of the licensee.
Additional Inspectors:
JUSTINE O MALLEY, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:30 AM to 12:00 
PM on 03AUG2022. 
 
The inspectors knocked on the front door, called both cell phones, yelled hello out back towards the facility, and waited 30 
minutes for a response, or return of the licensee. 
 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
JUSTINE O MALLEY, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section
